title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Feathers Casino, night. People flock in. The building is massive, the front entrance is prefaced with a long pool with water jets shooting water into the air. The interior is shown, with its slot machines and milling crowds. The boys enter with the Marshes and the Broflovskis. Randy and Gerald carry cigars in their hands

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Wow, dude.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Man, Indians have it good, huh?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Now, Eric, they're called Native Americans, remember? Show some respect.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right, let's go!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Halt.  I am afraid minors cannot go onto the casino floor.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I'm not a miner, dumbass! Do you see a shovel in my hand?!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You kids can enjoy our Native American Comedy Club.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right, we're gonna hit the tables. Why don't you kids run along to the comedy club?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right, time to win some money!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh yeah! blackjack table!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Welcome to the blackjack table. May luck run through you, like the spirit of the buffalo.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Gerald, this is ten dollars a hand!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Relax, sweetie  I know how to count cards.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well I don't wanna play here!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah. Come on, Sheila, let's go to the nickle slots.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oooo, the nickle slots! You might win the thirty-dollar jackpot! Ahh, women, huh? God I hate 'em.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right, time to show these people how to gamble!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: An entrance is shown - The Laughing Coyote Comedy Lodge, then the interior of the lodge itself. A Native American drummer sits on stage.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Welcome to the Three Feathers Comedy Club. Please put your hands together for Johnny Manymoons!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What is Native American comedy, anyway?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Thank you, thank you. Bear walked into a bar. Bear said to Deer, "May I please... have a drink?" And so Deer said to Bear, "Why the big paws?"

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Many moons ago, Pony and Eagle walked up to Coyote. Pony said to Coyote, "I am very mad at Eagle. Will you yell at him for me?" Coyote said to Pony, "Why can you not yell yourself?" And Pony replied, "Because I am a little horse."

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The blackjack table. Gerald sits alone fiddling with some chips. Randy returns from somewhere with a cup of coins

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How's it goin', Gerald?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ohh, not so good.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah, I know what you mean. I'm down three hundred bucks.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah. I'm down twenty-six thousand.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah, well, maybe we should- ...wait. Twenty-six thousand dollars??

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I forgot to tell you, ah I have a gambling problem.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Gerald, twenty-six thousand-!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Sshhhh! I have to win it back before Sheila finds out!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Where did you get that kind of money??

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The casino gave me credit! I put the house up as collateral! But I still have this ten-dollar chip.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dealer, twenty one.  Sorry.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: That's it. I'm destitute.  Loan me money! You've gotta have money in the cup!  Wha- what's in the cup?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Just six quarters!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh God. Oh Jesus.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Thank you for playing at Three Feathers. May your life be filled with the song of the sparrow.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh, shove the song of the sparrow up your ass!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Bears Casino, sometime later. Randy and Gerald sit on a bench next to some slot machines. Gerald's head hangs low

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How am I going to tell my family?  How do I tell them that tomorrow, we have to ...pack up our things and ...get out of the house?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: There's daddy!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh, Jesus.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Where have you guys been? We've been looking all over.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah. Come on, Dad, this place sucks. I wanna go.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What, What did you say?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I said I wanna leave.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh, you wanna leave, huh?! Okay, fine, Kyle, when we get home, we'll just pack up our things, load them in the car, and we'll leave!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What?? No, no, I mean, I-

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No, no, no, if you wanna leave South Park, fine! Tomorrow we're leaving!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Gerald, what are you talking about?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh, you heard him, Sheila! Kyle wants to leave! Our nice old house doesn't interest Kyle anymore! Well I'm callig the moving company right now!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well, you shouldn't be such a dick, dude.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What's wrong with Gerald?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: He... he lost his house to the Native Americans.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What?? But don't the Native Americans know he has nowhere else to go?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: They don't care.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The casino office. Chief Runs with Premise looks out over the floor

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Look at them! Small-minded idiots pouring their life-savings away!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Their cash flows out of them like diarrhea from the buffalo.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yes, but we have milked this simple mountain folk almost dry. If we really want to see cash flow, we need to bring in city people from Denver.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeessss. It is time for us to implement our plan.  A superhighway, built from Denver right to our casino!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: And what do we do about the small town of South Park that lies in the highway's way?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Simple. We buy it, and we demolish it! Ha ha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ha ha ha ha!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park Elementary, next day. A town meeting is being held in the gym. Mayor McDaniels sits at a table with four aides, two on either side of her.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: And that's really all I can tell you. The town of South Park is going to be leveled, in order to make way for a twelve-lane superhighway.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: But how can they do that?!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The Native Americans have purchased the land from under us. Tomorrow, they're buying the last of what they need to have complete ownership.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well can't we stop them? Let's call the bank.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The Native Americans bought the bank.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh my God.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Now, look, it isn't all horrible. The Native Americans are offering you retail values on your homes.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No, screw that! We'll just pool our money together and buy the town ourselves!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! Let the South Park people own South Park!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How much do we have to raise, Mayor?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three hundred thousand dollars.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ohhh, never mind.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How can they do that, huh? How can they make us all move away?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Because they're rich, greedy-ass Indians!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Native Americans.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Our whole town, gone. We'd had such great times here.

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Zombies destroy the town as the boys walk through in their Halloween
text: costumes

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Trapper Keeper grabs a phone booth as it reaches mammoth dimensions

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The townsfolk fight the mutant turkeys

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Christopher Reeve throws a truck at some people, and they dive
text: out of the way.

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The giant fireworks snake demolishes the town

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The Geldon causes havoc on the Drew Carey Show as the Knights
text: of Standards and Practices watch

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The pirate ghost ship fires off a cannon shot and the townsfolk
text: dive out of the way. Some of them are killed on impact.

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The pro-war and anti-war factions fight over the Iraq war.

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: The town reenacts the Civil War

role: Mr. Hankey summons up massive amounts of crap in order to get
text: rid of the Hollywood gliterati

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Mecha-Streisand fights off Ultura Marutin and Megara Poatia]

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: [stops reminiscing, turns around, and walks back to the boys]
text: We can't let them do it, you guys! We have to find a way to stop those Native Americans!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah, this is our town!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We shouldn't have to make a bunch of new friends somewhere else. We're a team!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: That's right!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah, ahh, that's right!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah, we're a team!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We just gotta figure out a way to raise three hundred thousand dollars!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Wait a minute! I've got it, you guys! We can get Kyle infected with AIDS! And then start a charity organization that we steal money from! Come on, let's go!  No? We can't give Kyle AIDS?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We need somethng that'll get us money tomorrow!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Hey, I know! How about a dog parade?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dog parade?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! We dress up all our dogs in little outfits, and parade them down the street. It'll be so adorable!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How do we make three hundred thousand dollars doing that?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh... Uh well, we could sell tickets to our moms and dads.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Our moms and dads are the ones who need money, Butters!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh...

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Maybe give Kyle AIDS, huh? Lookin' a little better now.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, later on, day. The Broflovski house is shown, and a massive bulldozer rolls up to knock it down. A large chunk of it is torn off by the scoop.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh, Gerald, I, I can't watch!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How can you do this to people?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We're sorry. But if we do not build a superhighway, our casino might stop seeing profits.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: There's more to life than profits!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well like what?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well like, you know, Slurpees and stuff.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well, come on, honey, I guess we should start packing up our things as well.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah.  So long, South Park.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Mom! Dad! We figured out a way we could raise three hundred thousand dollars!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: A dog parade?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stan, we've all tried to raise money, but we only raise ten thousand dollars, and the deadline is tomorrow.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I know. So how about we take the ten thousand dollars back to the Indian casino? Tell them, Kyle!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The odds on a single number in roulette are thirty-five to one.  That means, with a ten thousand dollar bet, you win three hundred and fifty thousand.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Boys, that's ridiculous.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Look, we, we've got nothing to lose.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What do you guys think?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It's a long shot.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah.  But it's the only shot we've got to save our town.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Feathers Casino, that night. The townsfolk are there once more

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The residents of South Park had hoped to raise three hundred thousand dollars. but in the end managed to raise only ten. The loss of their town may be imminent for the poor people of South Park. Awww, I think I'm going to cuwhy.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: HA ha ha ha! HA ha ha ha!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The doors open and the townsfolk surge in. Randy carries a large amount of yellow chips

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right, boys. You're gonna have to wait here.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dad.  Good luck.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It's in God's hand now.  Stand aside, everyone!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What are they doing?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We're gonna try and beat you at your own game, Chief Runs With Premise! Ten thousand dollars!  On thirty one black!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Impossible!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Come on! Come on!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Thirty one. Black.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! All right! Woohoo! Oh we did it! We did it! Oh my God! Oh this is amazing!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No... NOOO!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park is saved.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We have plenty enough to save our town now!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! But wait.  Three hundred and fifty thousand dollars. That means if we won again, it will be twelve and a quarter million!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We can save the town and be super-rich!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh hell yeah! Let it ride!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Let it ride!!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Woohoo! Yeah!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What the hell are they doing??

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Let's go thirty one! Let's see it!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Two, red. You lose.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: AWWWWWWW!!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Damnit!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Hmmm!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Theh, they had it! They freakin' had it!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The road. The Marshes drive home in their car, a much nicer one than the one they had once. Randy drives, Sharon sits on the passanger side. Stan sits between Shelley and Grandpa in the back seat.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You totally had it! You had enough to save the town and then some.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stan? Okay? You just don't understand the fine points of gambling. You're never supposed to stop when you're on a winning streak.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: A winning streak??!! You played one game!!!!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stan? Okay?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What???

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right? Stan? Okay?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You people just got greedy, like the Native Americans!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Hey, mister!! We're not like them, all right?!  Now, we may have pie in the sky dreams once in a while, but we aren't the ones kicking people out of their homes! So don't you compare us to those cold-hearted, money-grubbing, evil stinky Indians!  I'm sorry, Native Americans.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, next day. A "SOLD" sign is placed above the town sign, indicating that the town, indeed, has been sold. At South Park Elementary, the residents stand in long lines waiting for the checks being offered for their homes

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: There you are, sir. There's the check for your home. Just sign here, and here.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well, this is it, Mr. Slave. We're officially homeless.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Jezuth! Jezuth Chrith!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dad, what are you doing?! Don't take their dirty money!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stanley, we don't have a choice. The Native Americans own South Park now. We have to take what they'll give us for our homes.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: There you go. Have a nice day.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Come on, you guys! This is our town!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It's over, Stanley. What else can we do?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We can stay. And fight.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! When the Indians come to tear up our town, we kick 'em in the nuts!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: (Yeah!)

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! They don't own our town! We do!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I'm sorry, boys. You just don't understand economics.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It'll be okay, boys, we'll just... move to the next town over.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh sure. Until the Native Americans decide they want that land, too! What if the Native Americans just keep building their casinos and their highways uh, until we have nowhere else to go?? We have to stand up to them now!  Rrrgh! Forget it! Come on, you guys!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You're all a bunch of God-damned pussies!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, day. Moments later, a train of bulldozers roll down into town. Runs with Premise, riding on the lead bulldozer, looks happy until he sees the boys standing abreast on the street, blocking the way

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Get out of our way!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No! We won't let you destroy our town!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Boys. It isn't your town anymore.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Just because you have a piece of paper saying you own it doesn't make it yours. We grew up here. Our parents grew up here. We shop at that Wal-Mart, and eat at that Chilis. We take fish from the streams and bread them and freeze them to make fish sticks. This is not just a town, it is our way of life.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well your way of life is about to change, little boys. Now move!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You can't just roll into places and take people's lives away!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: And what are four little boys going to do to stop us, huh?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We are strong

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: No one can tell us we're wrong [Stan looks behind him, smiles,
text: then looks up to his left. People now appear on the roofs of the buildings as well as on the street.]

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Searching our hearts for so lohh-oo-ohh-oo-ong [Stan looks at
text: the roofs on the other side of the street, smiling.]

title: RED MAN S GREED
role: Both of us knowing... [The boys grin]

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: This land is not for sale.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Damnit! I thought you said they were dealt with!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: They were!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Sorry, Charlies! You can just keep your filthy bastard Indian money!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Filthy bastard Native American money!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Uh oh, right, huh. Sorry about that.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: This isn't over!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We'll never give up! You bastards!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yeah! South Park is ours.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: But, what do we do now? I mean, we can't just stand here and block their way forever.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We can stand here as long as it takes.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Feathers Casino, night. Chief Runs with Premise looks over the casino floor from his office

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What is the state of our people?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Last nignt I spoke with the spirit of the bear, and Bear said that if we do not build our highway soon, our investors may soon sell off their shares of the new casino.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yes, and Eagle says the cumulative shared market loss on the revenue of the new casino drops fiftenn percent every day.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Then we must force the South Park people off their petty land.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: But they are determined and proud. And the spirit of the wind has stated that if we use force, it could be a publicity nightmare, further hurting our net assets.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I already have a plan how we can force them off our land... sneakily.  We're going to give them...  blankets.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Blankets?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yes. We will present the blankets as a peace offering. But what the round-eyes will not know is that the blankets are infected with SARS.  They will all get SARS! And then SARS will run through their town like a buffalo. Now I need your help getting the SARS onto the blankets.  Okay, bring them in!  Let's see how South Park deals with this! Everyone grab a Chinese person and rub them on a blanket.  Make sure you rub them all over. Get the SARS nice and deep in there.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, next day. The deadline has arrived

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Tom, I'm standing in chilly South Park, Colorado, where the residents are entering the third day of their sit-in to try and stop Native Americans from building a superhighway through their town. The temperature is low, but spirits are pretty low, too.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What do they want?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We're not moving, assfaces!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Free blanket?  Though I know we have differences, we believe a compromise can be reached. In the meantime, it hurts us to see you all on television sitting in the cold. Will you not take this offering as a gesture of goodwill?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You had me at "free blanket."

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Free blanket? Free blanket? Free blanket...

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Tom, it now looks as if the Native Americans are handing out blankets as a sign of goodwill towards the South Park people. What an incredible display of compassion. I certainly hope there's nothing sinister behind it.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Please. As a token of good faith.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You... understand if I'm a little wary of trusting you.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It is only a blanket, Mister Marsh.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well, thanks.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Oh. You're welcome.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, day, later. People are anywhere from asleep to sick.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Tom, it's Tuesday morning now, and the outbreak of SARS in South Park has reached epic proportions.  The entire town has been quarantined by the federal government, nobody allowed in our out, which means, nobody can come to our aid.  It appears this town, and this reporter, are done for. Coming up next, choosing the right hair conditioner. What you don't know about hair care products could be costing you a bundle.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Randy has taken ill and now lies under a lean-to. Sharon sits on one side of the lean-to, Shelley on the other. Stan walks up to his dad with a can of beer in his hand. Randy coughs

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It's all right, dad.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How's your... mother?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: She's hanging in there.  Here, drink some beer.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It's cool on my tongue.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You're gonna be all right.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stanley, listen to me. I have SARS. There's only a ninety-eight percent chance that I will live.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No, Dad, NO.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Listen, Stan. SARS is destroying our people. The Native Americans put it in the blankets they gave us.  Soon there will be only ninety-eight percent of us left.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What can I do?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You... must find a cure for SARS, son. And save our people.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Cure SARS? Aw, Jesus!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: The spirit of middle-class white people is strong in you, son. Seek out the wise man in Bellocreek. Now go. GO!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Bellocreek Trailer Park. Stan approaches it and enters. He walks up to a trailer and knocks on the door.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Hey, my name's Stan, and I was-

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Your coming was foretold to me. You've come to save our people. Come in.  Watch the cats.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Uh so, do you know how to cure SARS?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Me?? Huh, no. I am just a guide. Sit down.  You must find the answer yourself, by taking an inward journey.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: An inward journey? That sounds kind of gay.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Let the voices of our ancestors show you the way.  Breathe. Breathe from the bag of visions.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ah! Oh, dude!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Feathers Casino, night. Chief Runs with Premise holds a meetingn in his second-story office.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: How much longer must we wait for our superhighway??

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: SARS has spread through the entire town of South Park, Chief Runs with Premise. Their wills will break soon.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Then I suppose we must be patient.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Runs with Premise, come quickly!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What is the matter, wife?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It is our son, Premise Running Thin. He is very sick.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Premise Running Thin's bedroom. He's in bed, wearing a headband with a feather attached to it. His parents approach

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Premise Running Thin, what is the matter?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: He, he shared a cup with one of the people from China. He has SARS!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: No! I told you not to touch them!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Papa. Papa...

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: I have given him herbs from the desert plant and water from the cactus of life. But nothing seems to be working.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: This would never have happened if those townspeople would have just moved away! No more waiting around! Tomorrow we begin the final stage of our plan! Shock and Awe!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: South Park, next day. The townspeople are still sick. Stan runs up to Randy.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dad! Dad!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Stanley. Did you have an inward journey with the old man? Did you have a vision??

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Ah, I don't know if I did or not. I, I saw something, someone spoke to me and... told me the middle-class white way to cure SARS.  Campbell's Chicken Noodle Soup, Dayquil, and Sprite.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Yes. Yes, of course. Quickly, Stan, we must give it to everyone!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Boy, that really did the trick, Stan. I thought we were kind of, sort of, not really done for.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Thanks to you, we're all safe now, Stan.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Now, I will blow your weak, SARS-infested bodies off the Earth!  What the?  Wait a minute.  Stop! Stop!  Your, your SARS. Where did it go?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We have cured ourselves using the medicines of our culture.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: My son... Premise Running Thin has the SARS as well.  You... you can cure him?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Three Feathers Casino, upstairs. Premise Running Thin sits in bed sipping his soup. A can of Sprite and some Dayquil are on his tray. Around his bed are the Three Feathers tribe on one side, the South Park residents on the other

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: It is amazing. All our plants and herbs failed to heal him, but your people's remedy brings the spirit of the buffalo back into his heart. Perhaps there are many things we can learn from your way of life.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: We're a simple people. All we want is to be allowed to live our lives.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: You have cured Premise Running Thin. In return, I shall give you all five dollars credit at the casino.  All right, all right, I will not build a superhighway through your town. And you can all have your homes back.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: All right! Yeah!  Woohoo!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Well, I guess we all learned that South Park is more than just a town. It's a community that nobody can split up.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Dude, who the hell are you?

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Alex. Alex Glick. I got to come on and do the guest voice thingy.

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: What?! Get the hell out of here!

title: RED MAN S GREED
text: Hi Mom! Hi Dad! Hi Joe!
